long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Grub gloves feature flip-over mittens to add extra warmth at a moment's notice. They combine warm Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) fabric and insulated ripstop nylon covers. Touch-screen-compatible palms and fingers allow you to operate touch-screen devices and add grip, protection and durability. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) fleece insulates even when wet, breathes well and stretches to move with you. Hand and thumb backs and flip-over mittens are made from wind and water-resistant ripstop nylon quilted with nonbulky Thermal.Q(TM) synthetic insulation. Thermal.Q insulation adds lofty warmth and continues to insulate even when damp. Mittens tuck into the back of hands with minimal bulk. Mountain Hardwear Grub gloves have a Durable Water Repellent finish that sheds moisture. Flatlock seams reduce chafing and increase durability.
